name: Job the Leprechaun
overview: Help Job the Leprechaun to rescue his friend Eri in this retro style platformer game. Collect all clovers on stage and find the door to go to the next level. A horde of goblins, zombies, caterpillars and more monsters will try to stop you, use your Magic Hat to fight them. You are not alone in this adventure, a cow and an elf will help you with their abilities.
